original: Cervin, Daniel, häradsskrivare, Halmstad, f. 11/12/96 i Gbg av prosten Reinhold C. o. Maria Cullberg. G. 40 m. Karin Jönsson. Barn: Marianne f. 41, Gunnar 44. — Stud:ex. i Halmistad 18. Res. t. Tyskl., Danm., Österr. o. Norge 36. E. o. landskont. i Hall. 1. 19, tf.^ landskont. 28, landskont. 41, tf. här:skriv. i Halmstads fögderi 42, här:skriv. där sed. 46. Kronoomb. o. ordf. i olika tax:distr. sed. 30, ordf. i Halmstads’tenniskl. 35- 45, hed:led. där sed. 45, sekr. i byggn:fören. Halmstads tennishall sed. 45, v. ordf. i Hatostads ork:fören. 46, sekr. i Tytösands ed: fören. 46. Hobbies: musik, tennis o. godf.
translated: Cervin, Daniel, district clerk, Halmstad, born on December 11, 1896 in Gothenburg to the vicar Reinhold C. and Maria Cullberg. Married in 1940 to Karin Jönsson. Children: Marianne born in 1941, Gunnar born in 1944. Daniel completed his high school education in Halmstad in 1918. He traveled to Germany, Denmark, Austria, and Norway in 1936. He became an assistant and then chief district clerk in Halmstad in 1919 and 1941 respectively, and acting district clerk for Halmstad's tax district in 1942. He held various positions such as a member and chairman of several tax districts since 1930. He was chairman of the Halmstad Tennis Club from 1935 to 1945, an honorary member there since 1945, secretary of the building association for Halmstad's tennis hall since 1945, deputy chairman of the Halmstad Orchestra Association since 1946, and secretary of the Tylosand Property Owners Association since 1946. His hobbies include music, tennis, and good food.
